Body:
dyn = self.dynSky.Copy()
dyn_qe = dyn.Copy()
dyn_qe.Symmetrize()
dyn_spglib = dyn.Copy()
dyn_spglib.SymmetrizeSupercell()
for i, iq in enumerate(dyn.q_tot):
    delta = dyn_qe.dynmats[i] - dyn_spglib.dynmats[i]
    delta = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.abs(delta) ** 2))
    self.assertAlmostEqual(delta, 0)
